languages.text: "Здесь мои кровные и названные дети — всех я растил как родных. И сейчас я должен защитить их. Помочь им прозреть".

traits.locale_text: "Здесь мои кровные и названные дети — всех я растил как родных. И сейчас я должен защитить их. Помочь им прозреть".

languages.text: "All of my adopted and blood children are here. I raised them all as my own. And now I must protect them. Help them see."
languages.original_text: "Здесь мои кровные и названные дети — всех я растил как родных. И сейчас я должен защитить их. Помочь им прозреть".

traits.locale_text: "All of my natural and adopted children are here. I raised them all as my own. And now I must protect them. Help them see.
"All of my natural and adopted children are here. I raised them all as my own. And now I must protect them. Help them see.
"All of my adopted and blood children are here. I raised them all as my own. And now I must protect them. Help them see.

"All of my adopted and blood children are here. I raised them all as my own. And now I must protect them. Help them see.

languages.text: "Alle meine adoptierten und leiblichen Kinder sind hier. Ich habe sie alle wie meine eigenen großgezogen. Und nun muss ich sie beschützen. Ihnen die Augen öffnen."
languages.original_text: "All of my adopted and blood children are here. I raised them all as my own. And now I must protect them. Help them see."

traits.locale_text: "Alle meine adoptierten und leiblichen Kinder sind hier. Ich habe sie alle wie meine eigenen großgezogen. Und nun muss ich sie beschützen. Ihnen die Augen öffnen.

languages.text: « Tous mes enfants biologiques et adoptifs sont là. Je les ai tous élevés comme les miens. Et maintenant, je dois les protéger. Les aider à voir. »
languages.original_text: "All of my adopted and blood children are here. I raised them all as my own. And now I must protect them. Help them see."

traits.locale_text: « Tous mes enfants biologiques et adoptifs sont là. Je les ai tous élevés comme les miens. Et maintenant, je dois les protéger. Les aider à voir. »

languages.text: “我所有亲生和收养的孩子都在这里。我将他们视若己出，抚养成人。如今我必须保护他们，帮助他们看到真相。”
languages.original_text: "All of my adopted and blood children are here. I raised them all as my own. And now I must protect them. Help them see."

traits.locale_text: “我所有亲生和收养的孩子都在这里。我将他们视若己出，抚养成人。如今我必须保护他们，帮助他们看到真相。”

languages.text: 「私の養子も血の繋がった子供たちもここにいる。私は彼らを全て自分の子供として育ててきた。そして今、私は彼らを守らなければならない。彼らに真実が見えるように」
languages.original_text: "All of my adopted and blood children are here. I raised them all as my own. And now I must protect them. Help them see."

traits.locale_text: 「私の養子も血の繋がった子供たちもここにいる。私は彼らを全て自分の子供として育ててきた。そして今、私は彼らを守らなければならない。彼らに真実が見えるように」

languages.text: «Todos mis hijos adoptivos y de sangre están aquí. Los crié a todos como si fueran míos. Y ahora debo protegerlos. Ayudarles a ver».
languages.original_text: "All of my adopted and blood children are here. I raised them all as my own. And now I must protect them. Help them see."

traits.locale_text: «Todos mis hijos adoptivos y de sangre están aquí. Los crié a todos como si fueran míos. Y ahora debo protegerlos. Ayudarles a ver.

languages.text: "Gerek evlatlık gerek kanımdan olan çocukların hepsi burada. Hepsini öz evladım gibi büyüttüm. Şimdi de onları koruyacak, görmelerine yardımcı olacağım."
languages.original_text: "All of my adopted and blood children are here. I raised them all as my own. And now I must protect them. Help them see."

traits.locale_text: "Gerek evlatlık gerek kanımdan olan çocukların hepsi burada. Hepsini öz evladım gibi büyüttüm. Şimdi de onları koruyacak, görmelerine yardımcı olacağım."
